post:
I find it hard to locate VPS providers with FreeBSD support. One could look for the underlying virtualization and hope for FreeBSD support if it's KVM or XEN-HVM, but in many cases this doesn't work, e.g. because the vendor doesn't commit for non-Linux support.

Can you list here your recent experience with VPS providers offering FreeBSD containers?

Here's what I saw:

* [hetzner.de](http://www.hetzner.de) - good performance, uptime, support
* [nqhost.com](http://www.nqhost.com) - excellent performance, uptime, support
* [chicagovps.net](http://www.chicagovps.net)
* [edis.at](http://www.edis.at)
* photonvps.com - messy support, stay away
* arpnetworks.com - unreliable and messy support, stay away
